snippet: Officials are resolute that the library belongs in Chicago, and said that a unanimous City Council vote Wednesday was an important step toward that happening.
abstract: Chicago City Council gives unanimous approval to make available 20 acres in either South Side's Washington Park or Jackson Park for Pres Obama's namesake library.
lead_paragraph: Officials are resolute that the library belongs in Chicago, and said that a unanimous City Council vote Wednesday was an important step toward that happening.

headline.main: Chicago Offers 2 Choices for Obama Library Site
headline.print_headline: Chicago Offers 2 Choices for Obama Library Site
